page.title: 01Dorridge & Surrounding Areas
page.content: Dorridge is an expanding village (present population is about 3000) situated about 18km south of Birmingham.It is a highly desirable residential area where{housing}is expensive and facilities are excellent to meet all needs.The{employment}of the residents is mainly in a professional capacity and many commute to places of work in nearby cities and towns{.Communications}are excellent, being close to the M42 motorway and having its local station on the main London-Birmingham line. The surrounding{landscape}is open countryside,farmland and copses,with many footpaths used by ramblers.There are sufficient amenities in and around the village of Dorridge which together with schools of excellent reputation make it a most attractive place to live.
